message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Why did you vote NO? Brief reason please">
ALL TEAM MEMBERS:

Follow-up: you all voted NO on "does this work need an introduction from others?" Please give your reason in 1-2 sentences. Why doesn't it need one?
</teammate-message>

input.content: The essays themselves are designed as philosophical experiments that construct the reader's understanding from within -- the author walks readers from concrete examples (collective interest, knowledge, cat-raising) into the formal framework, exactly as classical Chinese philosophical texts do (Mencius's child-at-the-well, Zhuangzi's parables). An external introduction would pre-digest what the author deliberately asks the reader to experience firsthand, potentially undermining the experiential arc that is load-bearing in these essays.
input.summary: Reason: external intro would undermine experiential arc

routing.summary: Reason: external intro would undermine experiential arc

An external introduction would pre-digest what the author deliberately asks the reader to experience firsthand, potentially undermining the experiential arc that is load-bearing in these essays.
